summary: Mötley Crüe is an American rock band formed in 1981 in Hollywood. The original members are Nikki Sixx (bass), Tommy Lee (drums), Mick Mars (guitar), and Vince Neil (vocals). They've sold over 100 million albums and are known for their wild lifestyles and glam metal music. Their live shows are famous for fireworks and other cool effects. The band broke up in 2015 but reunited in 2018. They've had several lineup changes, and as of 2022, John 5 replaced Mick Mars on guitar.
title: Mötley Crüe
